response.overview: Anirban Duttaâ€™s Jahnabi is a soulful meditation upon humanity, symbolized by the journey of its titular protagonist. A striking debut, it features some beautiful and melancholic cinematography with a poignant score. The film houses layers of complexity, becoming a device for the larger relationship that we have with nature.
response.title: JAHNABI

cast.name: Jahnabi Mitra, Jagannath Mondal, Ranadhir Biswas
